sentences.sContent: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the US.
sentences.sCn: 洛杉矶是美国的第二大城市。

sentences.sContent: The T-shirt comes in Small, Medium and Large.
sentences.sCn: 这种T恤有小号、中号和大号。

sentences.sContent: those who drink large amounts of coffee
A large number of students have signed up for the course.
sentences.sCn: 很多学生报名读这门课程。

sentences.sContent: ...a large proportion of staff are temporary contractors...
...they saw a large chocolate cake and they each were given a slice...
...Robots could also learn values from drawing patterns from large sets of data on human behavior...
...Researchers from the University of Connecticut Health Center asked the residents a large number of questions about their quality of life...
...a large amount of public funds is spent on roads...
...It is in no one's interest to keep a large segment of the population on the margins of society...
...We get a fairly large portion of calories from fast food and snacks...
...many federal and state laws impose post-conviction restrictions on a shockingly large number of Americans...
...the United States is also a large exporter of off products...

phrases.pCn: 详尽的；未被捕的，整个的

trans.tranOther: big in size, amount, or number
